ussr.physics
Interface ModuleFactory

All Known Implementing Classes:
JMEATRONFactory, JMEDefaultFactory, JMEMTRANFactory, JMEOdinFactory, JMEWhiteFactory
public interface ModuleFactory

A module factory creates robot modules in a simulation instance. The factory is called during setup of the simulation, based on the names of the modules that have been placed in the simulation. The prefix associated with the module is used to decide what factory is invoked. Factories are created in ussr.physics.PhysicsFactory.createSimulator

Author:
Modular Robots @ MMMI
See Also:
PhysicsFactory.createSimulator()

                  Module module,
                  Robot robot,

Create a module in the simulation instance.

Parameters:
module_id - the internal ID of the module, must be globally unique
module - the module abstraction to associate with the physically simulated module
robot - describes the module to create
module_name - name associated with the module inside the simulation
